data.title: Aurigny Air’s check-in: Web, Mobile, Airport and Counter
data.meta_description: In order to qualify for Aurigny Air's check-in process, passengers must arrive at the airport at least two hours before the scheduled...
data.text:
In order to qualify for Aurigny Air’s check-in process, passengers must arrive at the airport at least two hours before the scheduled departure time for domestic flights and three hours before the scheduled departure time for international flights. Aurigny Air recommends that you have your boarding pass 45 minutes before the scheduled departure for domestic flights, and 60 minutes before the scheduled departure for international flights.

Check-in for your Aurigny Air flight opens 24 hours before departure and closes 60 minutes before departure.

It is necessary to arrange the following travel documents before reaching the Aurigny Air Services airport:

passport or government-issued identification is required

Number of the e-ticket

Aurigny Air flight details and name

Aurigny Air Services Check-in Procedure

You can do it in a variety of ways:

Online check-in

Mobile check-in

Airport check-in

Counter for check-in

Web Check-in for Aurigny Air Services

Online web check-in is available 24 hours before departure time and ends 60 minutes before departure.

Aurigny Air Web check-in steps are as follows:

Visit the main Aurigny Air website (https://www.aurigny.com).

Select Check-in from the menu.

Enter relevant information, such as the confirmation number and the name of the passenger.

Select the continue button to continue.

You can download your boarding card from Aurigny Air Services.

Mobile Check-in for Aurigny Air Services

Follow these steps to use Aurigny Air mobile check-in:

You can access the Aurigny Air App on your mobile device

From the menu, select Mobile Check-in.

Please enter your surname and e-ticket number for your Aurigny Air flight.

Follow the instructions on the screen.

You can now download or save your Aurigny Air boarding card.

Check-in kiosks at airports

To check in, go to the airport and locate the kiosk machine

Start the check-in process by touching the kiosk screen.

Please enter your Aurigny Air flight e-ticket number and last name.

Confirm your check-in details and review your flight details.

Take a printout of your boarding pass.

Check-in at the Aurigny Air Services ticket counter

You can check in at the Aurigny Air ticket counter by following these steps:

Ticket counters for Aurigny Air Services can be found at the airport.

At the counter, present your Aurigny Air booking confirmation.

The agent verifies bookings.

After that, confirm the check-in request.

The agent will issue your boarding pass.

Boarding pass for Aurigny Air Services

To board an Aurigny Air flight, passengers must present both their boarding pass and a government-issued photo identification card.

At an airport kiosk, you can get a boarding pass

You can find the kiosk check-in area by finding the kiosk machine

Then enter your last name, followed by the booking confirmation number.

Choose your Aurigny Air flight.

Please confirm your details.

The Aurigny Air boarding pass can be printed or downloaded

At the airline check-in counter, you can get a boarding pass

Travel to the airport.

Check-in counter for Aurigny Air.

At the counter, show your ticket to the agent.

An agent will verify your booking and confirm your check-in.

Your boarding pass is now available.

Aurigny Air passengers can expedite the check-in process by arranging all travel documents in advance.

Visit http://www.aurigny.com for more information about Aurigny Air.
